welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Halfmoon, where small town charm meets big city opportunities. Explore our beautiful parks, local shops and restaurants, and experience the warm hospitality that our city is known for. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Halfmoon."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albany International Airport serves all airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used by low-cost carriers and offers a more streamlined and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'ALB Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schenectady County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Schenectady County Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
